title: Analysis of Historical Performance of Edap Tms SA Stock

content.text: Edap Tms SA is a global leader in therapeutic ultrasound devices for the treatment of urological diseases. The company's stock is listed on the NASDAQ stock exchange under the ticker symbol 'EDAP'.
To analyze the historical performance of Edap Tms SA stock, we will compare it to relevant industry benchmarks.
The stock price of Edap Tms SA has experienced fluctuations over the years. It is important to note that past stock price performance does not guarantee future results.

In terms of financial performance, Edap Tms SA has reported varying levels of revenue and profitability over the years. The company's financials should be analyzed in conjunction with industry averages and trends to gain a comprehensive understanding.

Market capitalization reflects the total value of a company's outstanding shares. Analyzing Edap Tms SA's market capitalization in relation to industry benchmarks can provide insights into its relative market position.

Volatility and risk are important factors to consider when analyzing the historical performance of a stock. Comparing Edap Tms SA's stock volatility and risk levels to industry standards can help assess its stability.
Edap Tms SA may or may not have a history of paying dividends. The analysis can consider the dividend yield and dividend growth rates, if applicable, in comparison to industry averages.

While historical performance provides valuable insights, it should be supplemented with other factors such as industry trends, company strategies, and market conditions to form a comprehensive outlook for Edap Tms SA stock.

EDAP Reports Fourth Quarter and Full-Year 2023 Financial Results
news.summary: Record Q4 2023 total revenue of EUR 19.6 million ($21.3 million USD) increased 24.8% over Q4 2022Record Q4 2023 HIFU revenue of EUR 7.5 million ($8.1 million USD), an increase of 38.8% over Q4 2022Record full-year 2023 total revenue of EUR 60.4 million ($65.4 million USD) increased 9.6% over full-year 2022Record full-year 2023 HIFU revenue of EUR 20.6 million ($22.3 million USD), an increase of 31.7% over full-year 2022Strong Q4 2023 U.S. Focal One® HIFU procedure growth of +136% year-over-year
